body:
- Various augmented reality and virtual reality projects, including game projects and unconventional solutions for bespoke clients.
- Implemented a game development build pipeline and related tooling to enable technical artists to iterate effectively.
- Contributed using Vue, JavaScript, and Three.js, and solved coordination and integration challenges between web development and game development teams to deliver an interactive 3D website for the New Zealand Pavilion at the World Trade Show in 2021.
- Coordinated and integrated technical solutions with 3D artists for interactive displays.
